name: Witch Please
description:
Description

Use your magical broomstick to avoid  enemies and collect crystals for your wicked brew! but be careful if you run out of mana the villagers just might catch you!  

Witch Please is a small student project made by a team of 6. We wanted to make a game for Halloween and this is what we ended up with. We didn't originally intend to make it available hence the lack of art work...but hope you enjoy!

The Team:

  • Dot Went- lead
  • Archie Grant- 3d Art
  • Oscar Mcartney-level design
  • Kira Kilgour- 2d Art
  • Jamie Bates- sound and technical art
  • Connor Austin- UI

How to Play

Find enough crystals in each level to put in your cauldron.  Use the gravity spell to carry the crystals; If you are hit by an enemy you will drop the crystal.

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Space = Hover

Left Click = use current spell

Scroll wheel down = change spell (Gravity spell only works on crystals)

Shift = dash
